Когда уже конец?

Doctor Freeman...

I realize this moment may not be the most convenient for a heart-to-heart, but I had to wait until your... Friends, eh? Were otherwise occupied.

There was a time they cared nothing for miss Vance, when their only experience of humanity was a crow-- bar, coming at them down a steel corridor.

When I plucked her from Black Mesa, I acted in the face of objections, that she was a mere child, and of no practical use to anyone. I have since learned to ignore such naysayers, when... Quelling them, hm? Was out of the question.

Still, I am not one to squander my investments, and I remain confident that she was worth far more than the initial... Appraisal. That's why I must now extract from you some small repayment owed for your own survival.

See her safely to White Forest, Dr. Freeman. I wish I could do more than keep an eye on you, but I have agreed to abide by certain... Restrictions, hm?

Now, listen carefully my dear. When you see your... Father... Relay these words.

Prepare for unforceen consequences.

-Gman.
лучшая игра в мире!!

Half-Life 2 is a continuation of Half-Life. Again a must-play video game and a franchise overall. You play the legendary character Gordon Freeman in the events after the Black Mesa Incident. The Black Mesa Incident attracted a multidimensional empire called The Combine, which conquered Earth in 7 hours. Now they use Earth's resources for them and the humans as their servants and soldiers, changing them biologically. Now you join the resistance led by Dr. Eli Vance to fight off The Combine. You are accompanied by Dr. Eli Vance himself, and his daughter Alyx (who develops a crush on you and just gives you funny love looks while using the standard body language to show she is interested in you, while you stand in front of her with a crowbar in your hand ), Barney Calhoun, the former security guard who worked in Black Mesa ( the character you play in Half-Life: Blue Shift ) and Dr. Isaac Kleiner. The game offers amazing gameplay and storytelling. 

Unlike Half-Life, Half-Life 2 has 3 modes and no Training room. The modes are: easy, medium, and hard.
Now the modes:
1. Easy- too easy, don't play this mode. Just go to medium. Difficulty: 0/10;
2. Medium- challenging, but you still can take a couple of hits here and there and be fine. You can walk to most of the characters and kill them with little damage taken. A good mode to play and enjoy the game. Difficulty: 3/10;
3. Hard- if you like pain and suffering a lot with always rewinding to a checkpoint and dying again and again very fast, then this mode is for you. The enemy does damage a lot and can take a lot. Especially the gunships and the striders. Difficulty: 10/10.

Weapons: The arsenal at your disposal is excellent, only the MP7, the submachine gun is not useful at all on hard mode. Low damage, fires, and wastes bullets fast. I used it as my last resource for fighting. The 44. Magnum is still beast-like in Half-Life. The shotgun and crossbow are perfect. And unlike the RPG in Half-Life, the RPG in Half-Life 2 is way better, useful, and crucial. You will also be using a new interesting weapon. The Gravity Gun. Amazing concept of a weapon and original to the Half-Life franchise, just below the crowbar.

Overall, a legendary game that every gamer should own and play.

ものを持ち上げて仕掛けの重しにしたり、ガス漏れを銃で発火させて押し寄せるゾンビを一網打尽にしたり、コンテナをぶつけてはね橋を無理やり開通させたり…物理演算を直接攻略にもちいたゲームは、おそらくこのHL2がはじめてだと思います。グランツーリスモ、DOOM3、マックスペイン2などですでに導入されていた技術ですが、単に乗り物や破壊オブジェクトを不自然な動きににならないよう転がしたり、死体のラグドール処理に用いたりする程度でした。その点では、ゲーム史に残すべき名作だと思います。
もし攻略に詰まっても大丈夫です。そのあたりにあるコンテナやドラム缶をグラビティガンでひきよせて発射させたり、クレーンでつり下げてぐーるぐる回してぶつけまくってみたり…こういった「遊び」の要素を自分でいろいろ見つけてみるのもおもしろいですよ。制限時間もないので、HL2という名のアスレチック・フィールドを思う存分楽しんでみましょう。これをさらにピックアップした結果、「ギャリーズモッド」や「Portal」へとつながっていきました。
ただ、評価点ばかりでなく欠点や問題点もちらほら見受けられます。
本編は謎解きに加えて戦闘シーンもありますが、弾薬が減りやすく、最大ストック量もかなり少ないのがネックです。アサルトライフルは90発、手りゅう弾が5つ、ロケランにいたっては3発しか携行できません。中盤以降は移動不可の弾薬箱（いちおう、無限に弾薬補給できますが）とグラビティガンを多用して突破するのが前提になっているのかなと思います。
また、ロケランは弾のホーミング挙動がおかしく、素直にガンシップやストライダーに向かっていけばいいところを、なぜかまどろっこしい軌道を描きながらそれらの周囲ををフラフラさまよい、けっきょく機銃で撃ち落とされムダになることが多いのもマイナスポイント。おまけに画面内に発射した弾が映っている間は次弾を発射できない謎仕様。すんなり突破させないようわざとそういうプログラムにしているのでは？と感じました。
グラフィックは、2004年製ということを考えればまずまずだとは思いますが、この年に出た大作ゲーム（DOOM3・ファークライ1等）にくらべると少々見劣りします。
キャラサイズが小さいこと（体格の大きい人物がほとんどいないからかも？）、陰影や光源処理が単純なせいか、ちょっとあっさりして見えるようです。テクスチャはそこそこ書き込まれていているんですが。別サイトでHLの特集記事を見たときのお話になりますが、ウリだった影の技法は、90年代末～2000年ごろの並みのPCゲームで使われていた技法と同等程度なのだとか。建物や地面の陰影は、リアルタイム処理ではなく固定光源の位置から計算したシャドウマッピングをあらかじめ貼付したものです。
最近のOSやグラフィックアクセレータでは互換性に問題があるのか、海がバグで牛乳のような一面真っ白になってしまうことがあるようです（Windows11・IntelHD520だとこうなりました）。
ストーリーも、少々難解で全体像がつかみづらいかなと思います。ラスト、アリックスやその父親、ゴードンはどうなってしまったのか？いちばん気にかかる瞬間にスタッフロールに入ってしまい、もやもやしています。
Это. Просто. Шедевр. У меня просто нет слов.

This game saved my life.

I am XxProgamer420xX.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.

After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you

10/10, where is Half Life 3?

Half-Life 2 is, in my humble opinion, one of the best games ever made out there.

Now i'll be honest, I haven't played many shooters (or games) in my life, I'm just some teenager dipping his toes into the gaming market.

But MAN, this game is simply amazing, it has some of the most fun gameplay out there, which, even when you've lost everything, still manages to keep you feeling like an indestructible one-man army.

Every enemy in the game feels unique, be it in design or in mechanics. My favorite in the game has to be the Strider: an enemy you can barely even kill which truly shows why the combine were able to take over the world in seven hours (plus he makes cute sounds don't judge me :c) 

Every location in the game also feels unique, with many just being so gorgeous (especially the citadel, which as gorgeous as it is it's also terrifying).

The puzzles aren't hard or common which is good for a casual player like me. Plus, most of them don't feel too out of place and their locations make sense.

The combat in this game is also just insane. I haven't had this much fun in a shooter since i first bought DOOM Eternal for my PS4. It makes you feel powerful but still reminds you that you're weak with the enemies added throughout the game.

Overall i would definetly recommend you buy this game. It's an action-packed masterpiece with gorgeous visuals despite being way older than me. 9/10 i need to buy the episodes now

I'm only a few hours into playing this but I can already tell that it blows any of today's FPS games out of the water without even trying.
Clearly Half Life 2 was made back when a game was actually worth the time of the player.
The game seriously doesn't feel like a 2004 release.
 Half Life 2 serves as what today's games should be and quite easily could be but apparently developers don't know what effort is anymore.
Today's shooters are just laughably bad when compared to this and a 2004 game really shouldn't have that affect but it somehow does.
Salute to Valve on this one.
Certainly worth your money.
